The League Championship Series are history, and the final two teams have emerged: The 2025 Fall Classic will see the [Los Angeles Dodgers face the Toronto Blue Jays](https://sports.yahoo.com/mlb/article/world-series-2025-dodgers-vs-blue-jays-position-matchups-how-they-win-how-they-lose-series-predictions-and-more-230536750.html). Game 2 of the 2025 MLB World Series begins tonight — Saturday, Oct. 25 — at 8PM ET/5PM PT, with the Blue Jays getting the initial home field advantage at [Rogers Centre, Toronto](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3daa87f2-c6d3-40c7-9637-c8aa7895a6c1&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=53b0e584-863f-4f2c-b173-4b978fcf200e&featureId=text-link&merchantName=StubHub&linkText=Rogers+Centre%2C+Toronto&&signature=AQAAAYoJm3LrQzli7Xz2F2W8otSxGyE04YspvOzM8WmOxK_O&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.stubhub.com%2Ftoronto-blue-jays-toronto-tickets-10-24-2025%2Fevent%2F158986944%2F%3FbackUrl%3D%252Fworld-series-tickets%252Fgrouping%252F121418) for the second night in a row. [Shohei Ohtani and the Dodgers](https://sports.yahoo.com/mlb/article/how-to-watch-the-2025-mlb-world-series-dodgers-vs-blue-jays-game-schedule-channels-streaming-when-is-shohei-ohtani-starting-and-more-170013615.html) are aiming to win their second consecutive championship, while Vlad Guerrero Jr. and the Blue Jays are eyeing their first ring since 1993. Despite Toronto's victory over Los Angeles last night, the World Series [odds still favor the Dodgers](https://sports.yahoo.com/mlb/los-angeles-dodgers-toronto-blue-jays-451024114/) ahead of Game 2. Every 2025 MLB World Series game will air on Fox and Fox Deportes. 

Of course, Fox is a "free" over-the-air channel, so any affordable [digital antenna](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=63045c63-8df1-46e8-bdd0-1716edf6ace5&itemId=amazon_B074TWSQFM&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=53b0e584-863f-4f2c-b173-4b978fcf200e&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon+Canada&linkText=digital+antenna&&signature=AQAAAbEe-T3Br4v8xKPF2kjeM4bYvtmbWkJUvaiHsQPA5xL4&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FChannel-Master-FLATenna-Ultra-Thin-Antenna%2Fdp%2FB074TWSQFM%2F) will pull in the game if you live close enough to a local affiliate. But if that's not an option, here's a full rundown of how to watch the Dodgers vs. Blue Jays World Series, even without cable.

## How to watch the L.A. Dodgers vs. Toronto Blue Jays, Game 2

You can stream Fox on any [live TV streaming service](https://www.engadget.com/entertainment/streaming/best-live-tv-streaming-service-133000410.html) that airs Fox local stations, including DirecTV, Fubo and Hulu + Live TV. MLB World Series games will also be available on Fox's new streaming platform, [Fox One](https://www.engadget.com/entertainment/streaming/fox-one-streaming-service-launches-august-21-164512558.html).

## More ways to watch the 2025 World Series

## When is the Dodgers vs. Blue Jays game time?

Game 1 of the Dodgers vs. Blue Jays World Series begins on Friday, Oct. 24 at 8PM ET/5PM PT. The Blue Jays are hosting the first two games of the series at [Rogers Centre, Toronto](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3daa87f2-c6d3-40c7-9637-c8aa7895a6c1&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=53b0e584-863f-4f2c-b173-4b978fcf200e&featureId=text-link&merchantName=StubHub&linkText=Rogers+Centre%2C+Toronto&&signature=AQAAAYoJm3LrQzli7Xz2F2W8otSxGyE04YspvOzM8WmOxK_O&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.stubhub.com%2Ftoronto-blue-jays-toronto-tickets-10-24-2025%2Fevent%2F158986944%2F%3FbackUrl%3D%252Fworld-series-tickets%252Fgrouping%252F121418).

## What channel is playing the Los Angeles Dodgers vs. Toronto Blue Jays?

[Every game in the 2025 World Series](https://sports.yahoo.com/mlb/article/how-to-watch-the-2025-mlb-world-series-dodgers-vs-blue-jays-game-schedule-channels-streaming-when-is-shohei-ohtani-starting-and-more-170013615.html) between the [Los Angeles Dodgers and the Toronto Blue Jays](https://sports.yahoo.com/mlb/article/mlb-world-series-2025-how-to-watch-game-1-between-the-los-angeles-dodgers-and-the-toronto-blue-jays-tonight-204536930.html), will air on Fox and Fox Deportes.

## When is the 2025 World Series?

Game 1 of the World Series between the Dodgers and Blue Jays is scheduled for Friday, Oct. 24.

## **Los Angeles Dodgers vs. Toronto Blue Jays World Series schedule**

_All times Eastern_

*   **Game 1:** Friday, Oct. 24, 8PM ET
    
*   **Game 2:** Saturday, Oct. 25, 8PM ET
    
*   **Game 3:** Monday, Oct. 27, 8PM ET
    
*   **Game 4:** Tuesday, Oct. 28, 8PM ET
    
*   **Game 5\*:** Wednesday, Oct. 29, 8PM ET
    
*   **Game 6\*:** Friday, Oct. 31, 8PM ET
    
*   **Game 7\*:** Saturday, Nov. 1, 8PM ET
    

_\*if necessary_
